alert.note: Alert for Barron; Rusk (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 18 at 7:05PM CDT until May 18 at 7:30PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: The National Weather Service in the Twin Cities has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Rusk County in northwestern Wisconsin... East central Barron County in northwestern Wisconsin... * Until 730 PM CDT. * At 705 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Rice Lake, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Weyerhaeuser around 720 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
